titleStmt.title: A Christian almanacke Needefull and true for all countryes, persons and times. Faithfully calculated by the course of holy Scripture, not onely for this present yeere 1613, but also for many yeeres to come. Written by J. M.
titleStmt.author: Monipennie, John.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed [by W. Stansby] for Iohn Budge, and are to be sold at the Great South doore of Pauls, and Britaines Bursse,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.

place.placeName: the Great South doore of Pauls
